Title: CakePHP allows direct access of prefixed controller actions
Description: Unconventional URL paths would allow direct access to prefixed actions without setting the correct request parameters.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.0.99, all versions starting from 2.1.0 before 2.1.99, all versions starting from 2.2.0 before 2.2.99, all versions starting from 2.3.0 before 2.3.99, all versions starting from 2.4.0 before 2.4.99, all versions starting from 2.5.0 before 2.5.9, all versions starting from 2.6.0 before 2.6.11, all versions starting from 2.7.0 before 2.7.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.99 before 2.1.0, all versions starting from 2.1.99 before 2.2.0, all versions starting from 2.2.99 before 2.3.0, all versions starting from 2.3.99 before 2.4.0, all versions starting from 2.4.99 before 2.5.0, all versions starting from 2.5.9 before 2.6.0, all versions starting from 2.6.11 before 2.7.0, all versions starting from 2.7.2
